key_commands.description: List all pods in the namespace to spot failing components and choose next diagnostics.

key_commands.command: exec_shell("kubectl logs -n test-hotel-reservation deploy/rate -<REPLICA_SUFFIX> || kubectl logs -n test-hotel-reservation deploy/rate")
key_commands.description: Inspect rate service logs; reveals 'not authorized on rate-db' errors indicating DB auth/permissions issue.
key_commands.original_command: exec_shell("kubectl logs -n test-hotel-reservation deploy/rate --previous || kubectl logs -n test-hotel-reservation deploy/rate")

key_commands.description: Check MongoDB (mongodb-rate) logs to confirm authentication/authorization failures linked to the rate-db operations.

key_commands.command: exec_shell("kubectl exec -n test-hotel-reservation deploy/mongodb-rate -- sh -c 'ls -l /docker-entrypoint-initdb.d && echo ==== && for f in /docker-entrypoint-initdb.d/*; do echo \"--- $f ---\"; cat \"$f\"; echo; done'")
key_commands.description: Attempt to inspect MongoDB init scripts to verify user/role setup; auxiliary verification of auth configuration.
key_commands.original_command: exec_shell("kubectl exec -n test-hotel-reservation deploy/mongodb-rate -- sh -c 'ls -l /docker-entrypoint-initdb.d && echo ==== && for f in /docker-entrypoint-initdb.d/*; do echo \"--- $f ---\"; cat \"$f\"; echo; done'")

key_commands.description: Describe the rate deployment to review configuration and environment; minimal contribution to root-cause.
Submit the identified faulty component (mongodb-rate) as the root cause.
